title: Lmao got banned for 3rd party software.
body:
Write my thoughts?
Apparently I either scripted used malicious software to gain some sort of advantage. 
Riot wouldnt tell me specifically what it was either. So basically they have no proof other than just banning on the spot.

Banned before guilty. Seems to be fair somehow. 

I got another account I play sometimes on Ill keep you guys updated if I get banned on that too.

Im calling out all admins and moderators on this one tbh show me what you got on me!

Bring it on.
